statute: (15) any payment made by an employer to a survivor or the estate of a former employee after the calendar year in which such employee died;
fact_pattern: Alice employed Bob for agricultural labor from Feb 1st, 2011 to November 19th, 2019. On November 25th, Bob died from a heart attack. On January 20th, 2020, Alice paid Charlie, Bob's surviving spouse, Bob's outstanding wages of $1200. The current year is 2020.
model_output:

In this case, Alice paid Bob's outstanding wages to Charlie, Bob's surviving spouse, in January 2020, which falls within the calendar year 2020. Therefore, there is no legal ambiguity in applying the statute to the fact pattern.
